title.rendered: Morzine All Weather Rope Weave Sofa & Armchair Set

content.rendered:
The Morzine outdoor set comprises of 1 Morzine Armchair & 1 Morzine Sofa. Purchasing a set works out cheaper than purchasing the items induvidualy. 

The Morzine features a rope effect twisted & woven backrest along with a textured powder coated metal frame and water resistant cushions.

The Morzine range is comfortable, modern, practical and perfect for commercial use whatever the weather.

The Morzine range is suitable for indoor and outdoor use to ensure that your venue can change depending on your clients needs and the weather! 

Dimensions:

Armchair – W: 650mm 11KG & Sofa – W: 1240mm 18KG
